{"WFWorkflowMinimumClientVersionString":"900","WFWorkflowMinimumClientVersion":900,"WFWorkflowIcon":{"WFWorkflowIconStartColor":2846468607,"WFWorkflowIconGlyphNumber":61440},"WFWorkflowClientVersion":"2605.0.5","WFWorkflowOutputContentItemClasses":[],"WFWorkflowHasOutputFallback":false,"WFWorkflowActions":[{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"is.workflow.actions.comment","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"WFCommentActionText":"Disable community plugins on mobile (with exceptions)"}},{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"dk.simonbs.DataJar.GetValueIntent","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"keyPath":"My Vault Repos.contentLeverage.Second-Brain","UUID":"D93BEEC4-4DC5-4CBC-86F7-7802E6DBA40A"}},{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"is.workflow.actions.runshellscript","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"Script":{"Value":{"string":"PLUGINS_DIR="￼/.obsidian/plugins"
PLUGINS_ENABLED_ON_MOBILE=(￼)

find "${PLUGINS_DIR}" -name "manifest.json" | while read -r MANIFEST_FILE; do
    PLUGIN_DIR=$(basename "$(dirname "${MANIFEST_FILE}")")
    if [[ " ${PLUGINS_ENABLED_ON_MOBILE[@]} " =~ " ${PLUGIN_DIR} " ]]; then
        sed -i '' 's/"isDesktopOnly": *[a-zA-Z]*/"isDesktopOnly": false/' "${MANIFEST_FILE}"
    else
        sed -i '' 's/"isDesktopOnly": *[a-zA-Z]*/"isDesktopOnly": true/' "${MANIFEST_FILE}"
    fi
done
